validation_rules: hasNFLInfo(inventory_id, {nfl_att1, nfl_att2, nfl_att3}, {filter1, filter2, filter3, filter4, filter5}|NOT_APPLICABLE)
description: Translate only rows where landtype has an nfl value. Note that none of these rows have valid species codes.

translation_rules: padConcat({inventory_id, src_filename, map_sheet_id, orig_stand_id, ogc_fid}, {4,15,10,10,7}, {'x','x','x','x','x'}, '-', TRUE, TRUE)
description: Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID
No horizontal structure so structure percent is 100

translation_rules: pe_pei02_countOfNotNull(species_1, species_2, species_3, species_4, species_5, landtype, layer)
description: Counts number of layers based on the presence of a valid species or NFL value. Custom function decides if NFL layer is present based on rules in NFL table. Identifies if species are present by checking the values against the valid species codes in the lookup table.
Maps source value to NAT_NON_VEG using list of values.
Maps source value to NON_FOR_ANTH using list of values.
Maps source value to NON_FOR_VEG using list of values.
